name: They Are Billions
content:
game:
  appid: 644930
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: corefonts
    arch: win64
    description: Installing corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx11_42
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: d3dx11_43
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    arch: win64
    description: Installing .NET 4.7.2 (it may take a while)
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: gdiplus
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  pulse_latency: true
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
